properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the FlattenerPreference (a Spread).

properties.name: rasterVectorBalance
properties.description: The amount of vector artwork to rasterize during flattening, specified as an enumerator or as a percentage in the range 0 to 100. Can return: FlattenerLevel enumerator or Real (0 - 100).

properties.name: lineArtAndTextResolution
properties.description: The resolution for vector objects rasterized as a result of flattening. (Range: 1 to 9600) For information, see raster vector balance.

properties.name: gradientAndMeshResolution
properties.description: The resolution for gradients rasterized as a result of flattening and for drop shadow and feathers when printed or exported. (Range: 0 to 1200) Note: Resolutions higher than 300 ppi increase file size and printing time but generally do not improve the image quality.

properties.name: clipComplexRegions
properties.description: If true, ensures that the boundaries between vector and rasterized artwork fall along object paths.

properties.name: convertAllStrokesToOutlines
properties.description: If true, converts all strokes to outlines and ensures that stroke widths remain constant during flattening. Note: Can cause thin strokes to appear slightly thicker than their original width. Affects all strokes, not only strokes involved in the transparency.

properties.name: convertAllTextToOutlines
properties.description: If true, converts all text to outlines and discards all type glyph information on spreads with transparency; ensures that the width of text strokes remains constant during flattening. Note: Can cause small fonts to appear slightly thicker when viewed in Acrobat or printed on low-quality desktop printers, but does not affect type quality when printed on high-resolution printers or imagesetters.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FlattenerPreference.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
